thread.title: Watch: US official dances on Saudi tunes - Khaleej Times

author: Web Team
title: Watch: US official dances on Saudi tunes - Khaleej Times
text: A video clip shows General Garrett trying the dance Saudi Arabia's cultural and heritage festival, Al-Janadriyah was recently celebrated in the city of Assir. Organised by the National Guard, the festival also saw the participation of US military delegates. The delegates led by Lieutenant General Michael Garrett took an active part in the festival. According to the Al Arabiya, the members took part in the Najdi ardha dance. A video clip shows General Garrett trying the dance. He is joined by Saudi attendees. (Video via Al Arabiya) The visit gave an opportunity to the US delegates to understand and take part in the unique culture and heritage of Saudi Arabia. The general was quoted saying that he was overwhelmed by the warm welcoming he received during the tour, in which he got to see some of Assir's most distinguished crafts.
